oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Farmers' joint reflection on strategies: example of using a learning tool
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seppänen, Laura
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentation of different farms was essential for using the learning tool. The way farmers modified the framework show locally important strategic dimensions. Strategic decisions go beyond the farm gate. Farmers' community seems to be important for motivation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Seppänen, Laura (2005) Farmers' joint reflection on strategies: example of using a learning tool. Paper at: Strategic planning and management on farms : NJF seminar 362, Vantaa, Finland, June 15-17, 2005.
